title: Pink Slime Block
summaries: The Pink Slime Block can be created with Pink Gel if the player is near a Solidifier. In a similar way to Silly Balloons, landing on Pink Slime Blocks negates fall damage and causes the player to bounce. Like with Slime Blocks, running over Pink Slime Blocks produces droplet particles.

The height of the bounce is dependent on the player's speed, not on the distance they've fallen. Holding a <linked>Portal Gun</linked> or riding the <linked>Slime Mount</linked> can allow for higher bounce due to the higher speed limit.
